narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This applicant has met all requirements to receive a class "C" exhibitor license.
All fees must be received before a certificate will be issued. Mail fees to: USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
                                                                                                                    920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200
                                                                                                                    Raleigh, NC  27606
No regulated activity can occur until your certificate has been issued.
 
Exit interview was conducted by Brenda Pietrosante, ACI,  with the facility owner.
